    public final class ScreenScore
extends Screen
implements BtnReset.RestListener, com.kotcrab.vis.ui.util.dialog.OptionDialogListener
    Shows current score & current high score to the user. Former ScreenDeath class. Created 26/11/2018.
    Author:
    Matthew 'siD' Van der Bijl
